title: Microcurrent Facial Roller Massager V Shape Face Massager Body Slim Reduce Wrinkle Firm Body Tightening Improve Face
features: 【V-shaped roller design】:Facial care with V-shaped double rollers can effectively present professional skills massage work. The multi-angle construction fits the human skin and is ergonomic. With consistent use, it can reshape the skin full of elasticity and glow.

【Humanized design】:This v-facial massager instrument is designed with simple and smooth lines of the atmosphere. Comfortable to hold, using the curvature of the anatomical principle, not affected by the angle, to achieve a professional massage technique.

【Occasion】: This V-shaped facial roller massager is suitable for use in the bathroom at home, at work, when traveling, and on business trips. Flexible detachable design with a complimentary velvet pouch for easy storage .
